loans.name: Iringa Group

texts.en:
Anastazia, who is in her late twenties, is single with no kids. She has been running several projects, selling sodas, juice, water, and fruits and vegetables for two years now. She works from 10:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Anastazia's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep on increasing her business stock and has paid all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profit to take care of herself, for loan repayment, and to cover household expenses.

She will use this loan to buy sodas, juice, fruits and vegetables, and to meet her customers’ demand. She dreams of making her business big.

Anastazia will share this loan with her loan group "Iringa", which consist of two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juice, fruits and vegetables, and to meet her customers' demand.

loans.name: Scholastica's Group

texts.en:
Scholastica is 50 years old and has nine children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very friendly person. Even though Scholastica is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Scholastica started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since then, she has seen her life improve; especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. 

Scholastica plans to receive a solar light, which she is so excited about since she will now have a generally improved quality of life. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community.

Scholastica’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 4.25 acres of land. In addition, the group will be able to receive 11 solar lights in total between them.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Met's Group

texts.en:
Met lives in a rural area of Stoeung Sen district, Kompong Thom province.  She is 48 years old, a married woman who has six children, with two of them dependent on her. Fishing has been the main source of her family income for 30 years, and she also works as a construction worker in order to earn more income to support her family.

This is the third cycle for Met with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid back her past loans as well. Now she leading her group to apply for a loan. She will use her portion to build a decent latrine for her family's use. 

With this loan, she hopes to improve her family's living condition and get better health.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine for her family use.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: Jashon

texts.en:
Poultry farming is one of the profitable business ventures in Kenya. Jashon, who is 34 years old, is a mixed farmer from Kitale, a rural town in Kenya. He has been practicing mixed farming for the past eighteen years. This hardworking man earns his livelihood through selling milk, crops and a personal business he engages in when the harvests are low.

Jashon passionately loves poultry farming, and rearing chickens is his hobby. Every day he wakes up in the morning to collect eggs and feed his chickens, and he finds this very fulfilling. Neighbors have been flocking to his compound to buy eggs, and through word of mouth, news has spread like wildfire in the whole village that he has quality eggs. The demand is so high he cannot fully satisfy it. Jashon is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Through the loan, Jashon will be able to satisfy the demand, and this will translate to an increased income level.

Through Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders, Jashon believes that small-scale farmers like him will be able to benefit from financial solutions. Poultry meat is a very popular meal among many people in his village, and this translates to improved income and better living standards. Jashon will sell eggs for commercial purposes and for home consumption. Increased income will allow Jashon to provide nothing but the best for his family and improve their living conditions. In addition to profits, he will benefit from poultry manure and poultry feathers, which will help improve his life.

loans.use: To purchase additional poultry.

loans.name: Sophin's Group

texts.en:
Sophin is 38 years old and lives in a rural area of Stoeung Sen district, Kompong Thom province. She is a married woman who has three children who are all dependent on her. The main source of her family income is from rice farming, and she also does fishing in order to earn more income as well.

This is the fourth loan of Sophin’s group of two members with VisionFund. She is leading this group to apply for the loan to build a latrine for her family. For this loan, she hopes to improve the living conditions of her family and also provide good health to the members of her family as well.

loans.use: To build a latrine for her family.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 38 years old from Ndagara, Ryeru, Rubirizi District. He is a principle farmer majoring in the coffee trade. His plantations are located at the above mentioned address. He is a married man with five children aged 12, 10, 8, 6 and 4 of whom only three go to school, and school fees are also a challenge to his pockets. He works in his coffee shamba for six days a week and ten hours a day. He also operates a retail shop in the same area run by his wife to supplement their income.

This business of coffee trade was started in the year 2005 and it has been very profitable. He resorted to farming after buying a piece of land from his neighbor who was shifting to another location and John added to the land that he had gotten from his father as his share. This is his sixth cycle and he is borrowing UGX 5,000,000 to buy more coffee for trade since in his area this is the coffee season. He needed more capital to boost his purchases and supplies to his clients who are coffee factories in Ishaka and Bushenyi. He hopes to educate his children to become vital people in the future and his challenge is competition from fellow coffee traders but as he said he is shrewd so he does not fear the competition. He requests the institution to keep in service to help people achieve their goals and targets.

loans.use: To buy coffee to resell.

loans.name: Sopheap's Group

texts.en: Sopheap’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sopheap makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Yim

texts.en: Yim and her husband Han( both in the picture standing in front of their house), are farmers with 5 children, live in Buk Toek village which has no access to power grid. As farmers, Yim and her husband want to expand their business with 7 hectares of land and improve their family's living condition. They are facing some problems because of the remote area where they live. Their house has no reliable energy source. They have to go to charge car batteries every 2 or 3 days for daily usage. Sometime, when they are too busy with their farm, they don’t have time to charge the batteries. The whole family is in pitch black for the whole night. Yim is applying for KIVA loan to buy solar home system. After using the solar home system, she believes her family's condition would be better and safer. She also can save time and money on utilities.

loans.use: to pay for solar home system

location.town: Buk Toek Village, Preaek Brasab Commune, Preaek Br

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her flock of animals and purchase balanced feed for them

loans.name: Om- Meshal Al- Hol Group

texts.en:
Iman is the featured borrower for Om- Meshal Al- Hol group, which consists of five women. She joined with her other group members to take out a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB. Because they have always been neighbors in Hodeidah, Yemen and have strong friendships, they are participating in this group loan. They are working hard to develop their businesses and to live at the same time.

Iman runs a business making traditional incense and selling it to local residents. Her income from this business is low and she wants to increase it, but she doesn't have enough money to invest in the business. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from Kiva partner AMB to purchase materials and the necessary ingredients to make traditional incense. Through this loan, her business will expand and she can attract more customers. She plans to use the profits from this loan to make a large amount of incense and export it to the Gulf countries, hoping to get hard currency. Iman and her family have a small apartment and their monthly rent is high. Through this loan, Iman will be able to rent a better apartment at a more reasonable rate. 

Iman looks forward to opening a large store from which to sell her products.

loans.use: To purchase materials and the necessary ingredients to make traditional incense

loans.name: Beatrice's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Beatrice, who, as a group leader represents eight farmers from the Kakamega North District in Kenya. She is married and is a mother to four children and is known in her community as a very hard-working individual.

Initially, Beatrice joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family. Beatrice will also be purchasing a solar light this year which she is excited about because she will now have light during the dark hours giving her children more time to study. With the profits from the coming harvest, Beatrice plans to send her children to school.

Between the eight farmers in Beatrice's Group, a total of four acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. In addition, the group will also receive five solar lights in total between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve their maize harvests.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar home system

loans.name: Teresa Jackeline

texts.es:
Teresa tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con familia estable. Vive en casa familiar con su cónyuge y sus 02 hijos en una comunidad habitada por gente amable que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería y se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a prestar servicio de internet, copias, tipeos, etc. desde hace 01 año aproximadamente, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus clientes. El préstamo será para invertir en la compra de una computadora para implementar su negocio, lo que le permitirá brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y le generará mayores ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is 30 years old and in a common-law marriage. She has a stable home with her partner and two children. 

They live in a community of friendly people dedicated to farming, commerce, and raising animals. It is located in the district of Zaña, province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, in the northern coast of Peru.

She has been working for a year offering internet and clerical services such as copying and typing. She has experience in this work, and good references from her clients. 

The loan is to buy a computer for her business. This will allow her to offer better services, earn higher income, and thus improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a computer for her business.

loans.name: Kinole Group

texts.en:
Benesia, who is in her early forties, is a widow and mother of three children, one of whom is still in school and the others are adults. She has been a food vendor for six years. Benesia works from 6am to 10pm daily and earns a good monthly profit.

This will be Benesia's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to open a small shop to sell water, soda and juice. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva's support. She used her profits to pay school fees, repay loans, pay her helpers in her mamalishe (store) and cover household expenses. Benesia will use this loan to start selling charcoal and to buy meat, beans, flour, cooking oil, salt, rice, etc. She dreams of owning a big clothing shop. Benesia will share this loan with her loan group "Kinole" which has seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to start selling charcoal and to buy meat, beans, flour, cooking oil, salt, rice, etc.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  “Virgen de Fatima” está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan para salir adelante.
La Sra. Irma, pide este préstamo para  la compra de ropas y calzados y volver a venderlas, ya que se dedica a ese negocio, y por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora que se esfuerza cada día para poder ir mejorando.
Quiere seguir capacitándose, para poder crecer y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias
texts.en:
The Virgen de Fatima group is in its third loan cycle as part of the Women's Committee Program, where all members work and support each other to get ahead.

Irma is requesting this loan to buy clothing and footwear to sell, which is her business. Through this work she gets the income to help her family and loved ones. She is a tenacious, hard-working woman who makes efforts to improve every day.

She'd like to continue receiving training to grow and improve her own and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear to sell.

loans.name: Petronila's Group

texts.en:
Petronila is 40 years old and has six children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Petronila is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by eight farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Petronila started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since then, she has seen her life improve; especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community.

Petronila’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 4.5 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will be receiving a solar light, a total of 6 solar lights will be received as well.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is a 32-year-old married woman from a village near Jenin city. She lives with her husband and three children in a small house. Her husband works as an employee in a local company. The family also has a farm in the village where they plant seasonal crops. It is a very good business and provides them with a good income.

Manal took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy seeds and seedlings for the family farm. This will increase their income and improve the family's living conditions.

Manal appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for the family farm.

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Nueva Vida está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde cada una está esforzándose para poder mejorar su situación de pobreza por medio del trabajo unido.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Eresmilda quien en su  encuesta mostró estar en una situación de pobreza extrema que lucha para mejorar a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de sus ventas ambulantes que hace. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora para poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas, jeans, camisas, y otros productos para poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por mejorar.
texts.en:
Nueva Vida Group is completing the poverty elimination survey in which each member is making an effort to improve her financial situation through working together.

One of the members is Eresmilda, whose survey revealed a level of extreme poverty.  She's striving to improve through effort and continuous work in the sales she makes as a street vendor.  She's a very hardworking and persevering woman who wants to be able to grow.

Eresmilda's requesting this loan to buy clothing, jeans, shirts, and other products so she can keep making sales and striving to improve.

loans.use: to buy clothing, jeans, shirts, and other products to sell

loans.name: El Triunfo Group

texts.es:
El grupo forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que hace la encuesta de los 50 indicadores, para que cada una vaya mejorando por medio de su trabajo. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Isabel, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir en una pobreza extrema.
Ella tiene una despensa en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día, hasta muy entrada la noche. Es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, bebidas, panificados y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo y sus ventas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
This group is part of the Elimination of Poverty Program, which takes a survey of 50 indicators so that each one can improve their situation through their work. One of the members is Isabel. In her survey, Isabel showed a level of poverty in the category of level one, meaning extreme poverty. 

She has a store in which she works everyday from the very early hours of the day until late at night. She is hardworking and, above all, a determined person.

She has applied for this loan to buy vegetables, meats, beverages, baked goods, and more in order to continue her work and make her sales. She is thankful for the opportunity to continue to have an income from her sales.

loans.use: to stock her store with vegetables, meat, and more

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es:
El Sr. Benigno, es de Ciudad del Este,  es casado tiene 2 hijos mayores que aún viven con ellos, ellos son estudiantes universitarios.
El Sr. Benigno tiene una librería con artículos de todo tipo,  bien surtida, además de ese ingreso cuenta con departamentos que alquila, se inició en esta actividad con un trabajo que realizaba como asalariado, Su negocio está ubicado en un barrio muy concurrido, frente a una escuela.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar libros, lápices, cuadernos y otros insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
Benigno is from Ciudad del Este.  He's married and has two adult children, both college students, who still live with them.

Benigno has a well-stocked bookstore with a variety of products.  In addition to this income he also has rental apartments.  He started in this line of work in a job he was doing as a salaried employee.  His business is located across from a school in a very busy neighborhood.

He's requesting this loan to buy books, pencils, notebooks, and other supplies so he can continue making sales.

loans.use: to buy books, pencils, notebooks, and other supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Beatriz es una madre sonriente, alegre, trabajadora, educada, responsable, se dedica a dar servicios de salón de belleza,  ella sola se hizo cargo de 4 hijos, un varón de 22 años y tres mujeres de 17, 13 y 10 años de edad, toda una guerrera, verla trabajar es de admiración, el empeño y esmero que coloca en sus cortes para lograr una buena satisfacción de los clientes, que vuelvan porque sabe que todo esto le ayudara para seguir manteniendo a su familia que depende 100% de ella.

Beatriz busca sostenibilidad en ocasiones no puede invertir en mucho surtido debido a la demanda que tiene en su hogar, pagando arriendo en casa, en el local, la alimentación, transporte, estudio, pero todo esto le sirve como motivación, para es gratificante saber que puede con ello, que sus hijos están bien que comen bien.

Beatriz quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido para su negocio, principalmente tinturas, el resto de capital lo distribuirá en la compra de shampo, cremas para la irritación gel, cremas, esmaltes, exfoliantes entre otros.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a smiling, happy, hardworking, educated, and responsible mother.  She alone is responsible for her four children, a male, 22, and three females, ages 17, 13, and 10.

She earns a living providing services in her beauty salon.  She's a real fighter: to see her work is to admire her and the effort and care she puts into her cuts to achieve good customer satisfaction.  Her customers return because they know it will help her keep supporting her family, who depend on her one hundred percent.

Beatriz is hoping for sustainability.  Occasionally she's unable to invest in a lot of supplies because of household demands: rent, food, transportation, and education.  All of this is motivation for her, however.  It's gratifying for her to know that she can handle it, that her children are healthy and eat well.

Beatriz wants to request a loan to buy supplies for her business, primarily dyes.  She'll spend the rest of the capital on shampoo, anti-itch cream, gel, lotion, nail polish, exfoliant, and other products.

loans.use: to buy mainly dye, but she'll divide the rest of the money between shampoo and anti-itch cream

loans.name: Ruth

texts.fr: A 55 ans, Ruth est une femme veuve et vit avec un enfant à Djidjolé dans la ville de Lomé. Bien consciente de son état elle prépare de la bouillie à base du maïs dans son quartier. Ruth achète ses provisions  au marché de Lomé deux fois par mois et en trouve son profit. Ruth désire ce crédit pour acheter quelque sac de maïs et de sucre afin de couvrir ses charges quotidiennes et améliorer la vie éducative de son enfant.
texts.en: Ruth is a 55-year-old widow and lives with one child in Djidjolé, in the city of Lomé. Well aware of her condition, Ruth makes cornmeal porridge in her neighborhood. She purchases her supplies at the market in Lomé twice a month and makes a profit. Ruth wants this loan to purchase sacks of corn and sugar in order to cover her daily expenses and improve her child's education.

loans.use: To purchase one sack of corn and one sack of sugar.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Agée de 49 ans, Yawa est une mère de cinq enfants qui vit dans le quartier de Djidjolé. Yawa est une marchande de friperies et s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Yawa réalise une bonne rentabilité avec son activité génératrice de revenu. Yawa nécessite ce crédit pour acheter des habits, des culottes et des jupes pour gagner du bénéfice et venir en aide à l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aged 49, Yawa is a mother of five children who lives in the Djidjolé district. Yawa is a used clothing seller and buys her stock once a month at the market. She manages to get good earnings from her money-earning business. 

Yawa needs this loan so she can buy garments, short pants and skirts so as to make a profit and help with the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy 70 pieces of used clothing, 60 short pants and 48 skirts

loans.name: Amavi

texts.fr: Amavi vit à Tokoin aves ses trois enfants à sa charge. Elle est une femme mariée et âgée de  41 ans. Pour mieux subvenir aux besoins quotidiens qu’elle éprouve, Amavi vend des beignets cuits à l’aide de la farine de blé afin d’avoir un revenu leur permettant de se nourrir. Amavi s’approvisionne  deux fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs du quartier. Amavi demande ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de farine de blé, de sucre et des bidons d’huile d’où elle peut tirer du bénéfice pour relever les défis qu’elle affronte quotidiennement.
texts.en:
Amavi lives in Tokoin where she is raising three children. She is a married woman, aged 41. In order to better cover her daily needs, Amavi sells fried donuts (fritters) made from wheat flour, so as to have income to permit them to feed themselves. She stocks up on ingredients twice a month from suppliers in her area. 

Amavi is requesting this loan to buy sacks of wheat flour, sugar, and tins of oil which she can use to make a profit and manage her daily challenges.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of wheat flour, two sacks of sugar, and two tins of oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Mujeres Valientes Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado MUJERES VALIENTES está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres integrado por 15 mujeres quienes decidieron conformar su grupo para poder ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Liz es la presidenta de este grupo, se dedica a la venta de ropas interiores, es una muy buena vendedora, es por ello que le va muy bien, y tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora que se esfuerza para poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de ropas interiores, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called MUJERES VALIENTES is in its first loan for a women's committee comprised of 15 women. They decided to form his group to keep improving the living conditions for them and their loved ones.

Liz is the president of this group. She makes living by selling undergarments and is a very good seller. This is why she is doing very well and gives her the means to help her family and her loved ones. She is a fighter and a hard worker, and strives for growth.

She is requesting a loan to buy undergarments. This will allow her to continue with the sales. She thanks for the opportunity to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Rosa Mistica y está en su 2do ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 5 de las 18 señoras se encuentran en una pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria quien tiene una cantina donde vende comidas que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo luchadora, que está creciendo por medio de su esfuerzo y su sacrificio.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para hacer sus comidas, como verduras, carnes, condimentos, hortalizas y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Rosa Mística Group is in its second loan cycle in the women's bank program, in which all the members are committed to working and helping each other get ahead.  They're completing the poverty elimination survey, which revealed that five of the eighteen women live in extreme poverty.

One of the members, María, has a snack bar where she sells meals she makes herself and then goes out to sell on foot.  She's a very hardworking person and above all a fighter who's growing through her effort and sacrifice.

She's requesting this loan to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, leafy vegetables, and other supplies to make her food.

María's grateful for this opportunity to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, condiments, leafy vegetables, and other products

loans.name: Beatrice's Group

texts.en:
Beatrice is married, the mother of four children and is known in her community as a very hardworking individual. As a group leader, she represents ten farmers in Kakamega North District in Kenya. The members of this group will farm a total of five acres of land using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with their 75,050 KES loan. In addition, three solar lights will be purchased with the loan amount.

Initially, Beatrice joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because she wanted to have access to its quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since she joined the program, she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Beatrice is buying two of the solar lights mentioned. She is so excited because they will improve her family’s quality of life. With the profits from the coming seasonal harvest, she plans to repair her house.

loans.use: to obtain a loan for a farm, as well as buy two solar lights.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Dans le quartier de Lomé, vit Afi avec son unique enfant. Elle est une femme mariée âgée de 28 ans. Afi est une revendeuse de pate bandée préparée à base du maïs et gagne son revenu journalier grâce à cette activité. Afi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois auprès de ses fournisseurs. Pour acheter des sacs de maïs, Afi demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et tirer un revenu favorable pour l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en:
In a neighborhood in Lomé lives Afi with her only child. She is a married women aged 28. Afi makes and sells wrapped dough made out of maize and earns her daily income thanks to this business. 

Afi buys her ingredients twice a month from her suppliers. In order to buy some sacks of maize, Afi is requesting this loan to complete her purchase and earn good income for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to  buy three sacks of maize

loans.name: Rose's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Rose, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. She is 34 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has 4 children.

Rose is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Rose says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Rose will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.25 acres. Given that some members of the group will be purchasing solar light, the group will be able to receive a total of 6 solar lights among them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Thérésia

texts.fr: Veuve, Thérésia est une femme de 50 ans qui vit à Tokoin avec cinq enfants. Pour vivre et venir en aide aux besoins de la famille, Thérésia vend des  bananes plantains  dans son quartier. Thérésia s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et les revend dans son quartier en réalisant un bon bénéfice grâce à son activité génératrice de revenu. Thérésia désire ce microcrédit pour acheter des tas de bananes plantains afin de favoriser l’éducation de son enfant et  générer assez de revenus.
texts.en:
A widow, Thérésia is a woman of 50 who lives in Tokoin with five children. In order to make a living and cover the needs of her family, Thérésia sells plantains in her neighborhood. She stocks up twice a month in the market and sells her wares in her neighborhood, making a good profit thanks to her money-generating activity. 

Thérésia wishes to have this small loan to buy some piles of plantains and be able to educate her child and generate enough revenue.

loans.use: to buy three piles of plantains for resale

loans.name: San Pedro Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Pedro está en el ciclo número 6 del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. En ciclos anteriores se ha hecho las encuestas de eliminación de pobreza, donde algunas señoras se encontraban en una pobreza extrema pero ya se ha trabajado con ellas para que vayan mejorando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Zunilda, quien se dedica al comercio, es dueña de una Despensa bien surtida en su casa y además tiene una Cantina en un Colegio, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para la venta en su despensa, como ser verduras, carne, frutas, enlatados, panificados y otros,  y con ello poder seguir dando a sus clientes lo que piden, y a la vez mejorar su condición de pobreza.
texts.en:
The group called San Pedro is in its 6th loan of the Women Entrepreneurs Committee. Everyone works in this committee and helps to be successful. In surveys for poverty elimination in the previous loans, they found some women in extreme poverty but have since gradually improved the situation.

One of the members is Zunilda, who makes her living with trading and owns a well-stocked pantry at home. She also has a canteen at a college. She is a hard worker and a fighter who strives to improve the conditions of her life and for her families.

She is requesting a loan to stock her pantry with items such as vegetables, meat, fruits, canned goods, baked goods and others. This will allow her to continue meeting customer demands while reducing poverty.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, fruits, canned goods, baked goods and others.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité SAN CAYETANO es un grupo de mujeres vecinas de la Ciudad de Santaní, se encuentran en el segundo ciclo con 17 integrantes, están muy confiadas por el programa de Comité de Mujeres, ellas son mujeres humildes y trabajadoras independientes. Cada una tiene un objetivo que alcanzar a través del trabajo cooperativo y solidario.
La Sra. Lucy, integrante de este comité, cuenta con un copetín, donde ofrece minutas, golosinas y bebidas a los clientes.  Ella pide este préstamo para poder surtirse con productos para la venta, como ser golosinas, y bebidas varias. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere salir adelante.
texts.en:
The San Cayetano comittee is a group of women who live in the city of Santaní. They are in their second period and have 17 members. They trust the program Comité de Mujeres. These are independent poor hard-working women.

Each of them has a goal that they want to reach working together and volunteering. Lucy, one of the members, has a grocery store, she sells shaved ice, candy, and drinks to her clients.

She is requesting the loan to supply her store with products to sell, such as candy and drinks. She is a hard-working woman, determined to thrive.

loans.use: to buy candy and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Jameel

texts.en:
Jameel is a 35-year-old married man from Nablus city. He lives with his wife and small son. 

Six years ago, Jameel opened a barber shop in the city. He took a training class before and now he has very good experience.

Jameel took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy some tools for his barber shop.  This will improve his business and also his income. 

Jameel appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy some tools for his barber shop

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Abla est une femme âgée de 39 ans. Abla vit à Adidogomé pour exercer efficacement son activité. Pour favoriser l’épanouissement de sa famille, Abla vend des pagnes dans le quartier trouve un gain qui ne couvre pas suffisamment ses besoins. Abla s’approvisionne deux fois par mois marché. Abla nécessite ce crédit pour commander des pagnes afin de satisfaire favorablement les besoins de ses consommateurs.
texts.en:
Married and the mother of two children, Abla is a woman of 39. She lives in Adidogomé so that she can effectively carry out her business. In order to foster the well-being of her family, Abla sells pagnes (brightly colored African print cloth) in her neighborhood but makes a profit which does not sufficiently cover her needs. She buys her wares twice a month in the market. 

Abla needs this loan to order some pagnes so she can better satisfy the needs of her clientele.

loans.use: to buy three lengths of brightly colored African prints (pagnes)

loans.name: Rincon Guasu Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  “Rincón Guasu Poty” está en su ciclo número 5 del programa de comité de mujeres, este grupo se formó con la unión de varias vecinas y amigas de esa ciudad, y es por medio del trabajo unido de todas que va mejorando.
La Sra. Graciela, una de las integrantes, pidió este préstamo para la compra de productos del consumo familiar y volver a venderlas ya sea: leche, yogurt, panificados, carne, fideo, arroz  ya que tiene una despensa. Es una mujer muy sacrificada que ha ido creciendo con su trabajo.
Graciela quiere poner todo de sí, es por ello que se esfuerza para ir mejorando en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
The Rincón Guasu Poty group is in its fifth cycle of the Women's Committee Program. This group was formed by the coming together of various neighbors and friends of that city, and it is through the team work of all members that the group keeps improving.

Graciela is one of the members, and she is requesting this loan to buy food items that she will sell such as milk, yogurt, bakery goods, meat, pasta, and rice, since she sells groceries. She is a selfless woman who's been growing with her work.

Graciela wants to do all she can, and she is making efforts to improve her micro-enterprise.

loans.use: to buy milk, yogurt, bakery goods, meat, pasta, and rice.

loans.name: Selina's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Selina, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. She is 54 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has 4 children.

Selina is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that she is able to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Selina says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Selina will be receiving a solar light this season and she is so excited since now she will have a general improved quality of life. Selina will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.25 acres. In addition, the group will also be receiving a total of 4 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: John's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is John, often described as an extremely trustworthy person. He is 32 years old. As a group leader, he is representing his group of nine farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is married and has four children.

John is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again so he can have access to quality training and so he can acquire new farming methods. This is why he decided to join in the first place. John says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2012, he has learnt a lot from farming trainings, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. John will use the profits from this season to buy a cow.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 4.5 acres. Some of the members will also receive solar lights; the group will receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Gerald's Group

texts.en:
Gerald, pictured above, has been a farmer for more than 20 years, and is now proud to represent his group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. He is 57 years old, married and has 8 children.

Gerald likes to think of himself as a very experienced farmer. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2013 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has been able to save more money. This year Gerald is purchasing a solar light which he is so excited about because it will allow him to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel therefore saving more money. Gerald plans to use the profits from this coming season to buy a cow.

In total, Gerald’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 6 acres of land. In addition, the group will also receive a total of 6 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Maurice's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Maurice, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. He is 30 years old and, as a group leader, he is representing his group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is married and has 4 children.

Maurice is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that he is able to have access to the best seed prices, which is why he decided to join in the first place. Maurice says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2013, he has learnt a lot from farming training, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. Maurice is also excited to be purchasing a solar light since now he will be able to have a general improved quality of life. Maurice will use the profits from this season to invest in a business.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 7.25 acres. In addition, the group will also receive a total of 6 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Joseph's Group

texts.en:
Joseph, pictured above, has been a farmer for 20 years, and is now proud to represent his group of 16 farmers in Kakamega North District. He is 45 years old, is married, and has 8 children.

Joseph likes to think of himself as a very trustworthy person. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2013 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to gain leadership skills. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has been able to consistently feed his family. Joseph plans to use the profits from this coming season to send his children to school.

In total, Joseph’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 8.25 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will be receiving solar, the group will also receive a total of 10 solar lights among them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase more car triangles to sell at the market to his customers.

loans.name: Hossnieh

texts.en:
Hossnieh is a 46-year-old married mother of three children. She has been employed in a company for nine years, helping her husband cover the increasing needs and expenses of their children.

Hossnieh is a sacrificing mother who is trying desperately to improve her family's living conditions despite her limited salary, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her daughter's school tuition fees. She hopes to stay capable of satisfying her children's needs.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's school tuition fees

loans.name: Mirvat

texts.en:
Mirvat is a 43-year-old single lady who has been selling clothes for six years to cover the needs and expenses of her family of two.

Mirvat is a hard workering, sacrificing, and ambitious lady who is trying hard to develop her business. Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business with merchandise from the new collection of spring and summer clothes. 

Mirvat hopes to expand her business more in the future and attract more customers to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase business with merchandise from the new collection of spring and summer clothes

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Elic is a married man who is 28 years of age, living in a rural area with his family of 3 children, one of whom attends school. He deals in his retail shop and spare parts for motorcycles. He started this business in 2010.

He works 7 days a week and 13 hours per day and he acquired this loan to pay school fees and to boost his retail shop business. He needs money to buy corn flour that he will sell to his customers. He anticipates a lot of profit if he buys in bulk. He has hopes of expanding into a large business which can supply all the people around in the neighbourhood. His clients are local people from the surrounding places.

The challenges he faces are price fluctuations of some commodities. He describes himself as a trustworthy man and a hardworking man. He also encourages lenders to always reduce the interest rates.

loans.use: To buy daily household use items to sell in the retail shop

loans.name: Wycliffe's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Wycliffe, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. He is 60 years old and, as a group leader, he is representing his group of 14 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is married and has 4 children.

Wycliffe is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that he is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why he decided to join in the first place. Wycliffe says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2013, he has learned a lot from farming trainings, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. He will also be purchasing a solar light which he is so excited about because he now be able to have light during dark hours for his children to study. Wycliffe will use the profits from this season to send his children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 10.5 acres. In addition, the group will also receive a total of 4 solar lights between them. "

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Christopher's Group

texts.en:
Christopher, featured in the above picture, is representing his farming group formed by 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is 46 years old and a married father of 7 children. He is often described as a very hardworking individual.

Although Christopher has been a farmer for 15 years, he is new to One Acre Fund and decided to join this year because he really wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Even though he is new to the program, Christopher wanted to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. With the profits earned from this season’s harvest, Christopher hopes to be able to send his children to school. He will also be receiving a solar light which he is excited about because it will allow him to reduce his consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

With this loan, the group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 4.5 acres of land. In addition, the group will also receive a total of 6 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize.

loans.name: Hisham

texts.en: Hisham is a 28-year-old married man from Nablus city. He lives with his wife and two small sons. Six years ago, Hisham opened a barber shop in the city. He took training before, and now he has very good experience. Hisham took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy some tools for his barber shop. This will improve his business and also his income. Hisham appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy some tools for his barber shop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase an amount of perfumes and incenses to resell.

loans.name: Ecelina

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Inhambane tem 48 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 3 filhos maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É negociante a mais de 11 anos de venda de feijão e amendoim onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Como forma de satisfazer os seus clientes solicita um empréstimo para aumentar o volume do seu negócio comprando mais amendoim e feijão. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende expandir mais no seu negócio e garantir o ensino do s seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Ecelina comes from the province of Inhambane. She's 48 years old and a widow. She has three adult children, all of whom are in school. She's not responsible for anyone else.
She has been a trader for over 11 years. She sells beans and peanuts, and she earns an income which she uses for household expenses. As a way of keeping her customers satisfied, she requests a loan so that she can increase her turnover by purchasing more peanuts and beans. This is her first loan with Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to further expand her business and provide an education for her children all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts and beans.

loans.name: Cardial

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Inhambane tem 52 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 4 filhos apenas 1 é maior de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha na empresa numa empresa de Segurança como guarda a mais de 8 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Cardial antes de trabalhar com a Hluvuku enfrentava varias dificuldades para erguer a sua obra de residência, mas hoje já consegui erguer uma casa do tipo 2. Com objectivo de finalizar a sua obra solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, janelas. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a obra e contrair matrimónio.
texts.en:
Cardial comes from the province of Inhambane. He's 52 years old and in a common law marriage. He has four children, only one of whom is an adult. He's not responsible for anyone else.
He has worked as a security guard for a security company for over 8 years. He earns an income which he uses for household expenses. Before he worked with Hluvuku, Cardial struggled to build his home, but he has now succeeded in building a two-bedroom house.
With the goal of finishing his construction work, he requests a loan so he can purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement and windows. This is his second loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to finish the construction work and get married.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement and windows.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a woman who lost her husband and was left alone with six children. She was very upset and sad for his death. Siham felt that her children needed her more than any time ever, so she decided to overcome her sadness and try her best to do anything to provide a living for her kids.

She started to sell clothes in her home, but she needs to increase her income to provide a good education for her kids and to cover the household expenses. Therefore, she has applied for a loan to buy more products to sell and improve her life.

loans.use: to increase her quantity of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some tools for his barber shop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase their Genge-Duka stock and to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough stationery to meet her customers’ demands

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en una comunidad grande en la zona rural de San Nicolas, una zona del distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura gracias a que está ubicada cercana al valle del río Jequetepeque, comercio de los granos y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como chivos, carneros y cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alberto is 54 years old and lives with his wife and children in a large community in the rural area of San Nicolas, part of the district of Zaña, located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The people of the community work in agriculture, selling grains and raising livestock, thanks to being located near the valley of the Jequetepeque river. 

He makes his living raising and selling animals such as goats, sheep, and pigs. His business is located in the back of his property. He has experience in this business and regular customers who provide very good personal and work references for him. He has requested a loan for the purchase of nutritious feed to fatten his animals and thus generate more income for his family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy nutritious feed to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Zulfinoy

texts.ru: Женщину на фотографии зовут Зулфиной. Ей 51 год. Она вместе с детьми проживает на районе А.Джоми, названного в честь великого писателя. Зулфиной приносит в дом источник дохода за счет деятельности животноводства. Она выращивает крупнорогатых скотин и продает молоко. На сегодняшний день финансовое положение семьи влияет на рынок и продукты питания дорожают. Зулфиной должна прокормить детей и обязательно дать образования, что в свое время не смогла получить. Зулфиною необходимо расширить деятельность и увеличить поголовья скотин, чтобы увеличить доход и покрыть растущие расходы. На данный момент у нее есть 2 коровы и 2 бычка. За счет денежных средств она собирается купить еще пару телят. Она верит в Вас и Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: The woman in this picture is named Zulfinoy. She is 51 years old. She lives with her children in the A. Jomi region, named in honor of the great writer. Zulfinoy provides the family a source of income through her work in animal husbandry. She raises cattle and sells milk. The financial position of the family currently depends on the market, and foodstuffs are becoming more expensive. Zulfinoy must feed her children and give them the education she herself could not obtain. Zulfinoy needs to expand her activities and increase her herd of cattle in order to increase income and cover growing costs. Currently she owns two cows and two calves. She plans to use these funds to buy another pair of calves. She has faith in you and your support.

loans.use: buy two calves

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Zambézia tem 50 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 4 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe.
Trabalha na empresa numa empresa de Segurança a mais de 11 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2014, pois com fundo próprio não conseguia erguer a sua residência, devido a insuficiência de crédito solícita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras e mais. Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar a sua obra de residência e abrir uma machamba com um sistema de regadio. O seu maior desafio é concluir a sua obra para dar conforto a sua família.
texts.en:
Eduardo comes from the province of Zambézia. He's 50 years old and married. He has four underage children and he supports his mother.
He has worked for a security company for over 11 years and from that he earns an income which he uses for household expenses. He started working with Hluvuku in 2014 because he couldn't afford to build his home on his own funds. Due to insufficient credit, he requests a loan so that he can continue buildind his house by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks, etc. This is his second loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to enlarge his house and start a farm with an irrigation system. His biggest challenge is finishing the construction work so he can provide comfort for his family.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, etc.

loans.name: Jordao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Maputo tem 46 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É fiel do armazém a mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2010, enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência solicita um empréstimo para adiquirir material de construção como: cimento, areia, blocos e mais. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra de residência e abrir um salão de beleza. O seu maior desafio é terminar a sua obra para dar conforto a sua família.
texts.en:
Jordao comes from the province of Maputo. He's 46 years old and married. He has three children who attend school. He's not responsible for anyone else.
He has been a warehouse supervisor for over 8 years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. He started working with Hluvuku in 2010 because he was struggling to move forward with the construction of his home. He requests a loan so that he can purchase construction supplies such as cement, sand, bricks, etc. This is his 5th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to finish building his house and open a beauty parlor. His biggest challenge is finishing his construction work so that he can provide comfort for his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as cement, sand, bricks, etc.

loans.name: Naser

texts.en:
Naser is a 26-year-old single man from Khanyounis city. He lives there with his family in a very simple house. 

A few years ago, Naser opened a barber shop in the city. He received training beforehand, and now he has very good experience.

Naser has taken a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a chair and some tools for his barber shop. This will improve his business and also his income.

Naser appears in the photo above.

loans.use: to buy a chair and some tools for his barber shop.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.pt:
A sra Elisa tem 31 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de 03 filhas das quais duas estudam no ensino primário e uma é menor de idade. Vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Com o financiamento de 10,000.00mts, vai comprar esteiras, refrigerantes, água mineral, cervejas de diversas marcas para revender num dos mercados concorridos da cidade de Maputo.
Tem o sonho de prosperar no seu negócio para poder construir uma Mercearia na sua casa e tem o desafio de reembolsar o empréstimo dentro do prazo acordado
texts.en:
Elisa is 31 years old and single. She has three daughters, two of whom are in primary school and one is below school age. She lives in a house that she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
With the loan for 10,000mts she will purchase mats, soft drinks, mineral water, and various brands of beer. She'll re-sell them at one of the busy markets of the town of Maputo.
Her dream is to succeed in her business so that she can build a grocery store at her house. Her challenge is paying back the loan within the agreed-upon timeframe.

loans.use: to purchase mats, soft drinks, mineral water, and various brands of beer for re-selling.

loans.name: Simiao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Inhambane tem 53 anos de idade, casado oficialmente pai de 6 filhos do quais 4 maiores de idade, apenas 2 frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus 2 netos que vivem em sua casa.
 Trabalha como guarda a mais de 6 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Enfrentando dificuldades para terminar a sua residência solícita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, pedras e mais. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e adquirir gado para criação.
texts.en:
Simiao comes from the province of Inhambane. He's 53 years old and legally married. He has six children, four of whom are adults and only two attend school. He supports his two grandchildren who live with him.
He has worked as a security guard for over six years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. Because he's struggling to finish the construction of his home, he requests a loan so he can move it forward by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks, etc. This is his third loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to finish building his house and acquire livestock for breeding.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks, etc.

loans.name: Julia's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Julia, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. She is 45 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 8 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has 4 children.

Julia is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again. This means that she is able to earn enough to feed her family, which is why she decided to join in the first place. She says that she is happy she made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family and thus improve her day-to-day life significantly. 

Julia will be purchasing two solar lights which she is excited about because she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. She will use the profits from this season to rent more land to cultivate.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 2.75 acres. In addition, the group will also receive a total of 6 solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid maize seed and fertilizer as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Xavier

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província da Zambézia tem 50 anos de idade, casado oficialmente pai de 3 filhos apenas 2 maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que se encontra na Zambézia enviando lhe dinheiro.
É Policia a mais de 11 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa, antes de trabalhar com a Hluvuku enfrentava varias dificuldades no seu negócio de criação de frangos assim como para construir sua residência. O mesmo solicita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras e ferro. Este é o seu 9º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende expandir mais no seu negócio de criação de frangos. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior
texts.en:
Xavier comes from the province of Zambézia. He's 50 years old and legally married. He has three children, only two of whom are adults, and all of them attend school. He supports his mother who lives in Zambézia by sending her money.
He has been a police officer for over 11 years and earns an income which he uses for household expenses. Before he worked with Hluvuku he struggled with his chicken farm business and also with the construction of his home. He requests a loan so that he can continue building his house by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks and iron. This is his 9th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to further expand his chicken farm. His challenge is providing his children with an education all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy enough cell phone airtime to provide to all her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tableware and used clothing for re-selling.

loans.name: Joselito

texts.es:
Joselito tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico, es soltero, no cuenta con ningun hijo en su poder, tiene 15 años radicando en la zona, tiene muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales en su comunidad, la misma que esta ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. En dicha comunidad la población se dedica básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

La actividad a la que se dedica Joselito es a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha, esto lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Joselito is 36 years old.  He lives in his own house made out of rustic materials.  He is single and doesn't have any children.  He has lived in the area for 15 years.  He has very good personal and work references in his community, which is located in the district of Pucará, Jaén province, Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.  In this community the people basically make a living in agriculture, livestock and commerce. 

Joselito makes a living in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of pineapple, with 10 years experience in the field.  He will use the loan granted to him in agricultural work, in the application and integration of disease control products, fertilizers and to pay for labor for his harvest.  This will help him to improve his crop physiologically, morphologically and productively as well as have a timely harvest.  Therefore he will have greater production and a better quality product and, consequently, he won't have problems selling his product.  This will generate for him greater income that will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: with the application and integration of disease control products and fertilizers; and to pay for labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Athena

texts.en:
Athena is a 33-year-old married mother of three children, and she has been selling mobile phones for four years. 

She is a sacrificing woman who decided to start working in order to stand by her husband and help him to cover the increasing needs and expenses of their beloved children.

Athena is an ambitious lady who is trying hard to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of mobile phones and accessories to satisfy the needs of her customers and attract new ones.

Athena hopes to expand her business in the future to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of mobile phones and accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to diversify her clothing business by buying household products to sell

loans.name: Faudhia

texts.en:
Faudhia is a 23-year-old grocery store owner, volunteer teacher, and mother. She runs a small grocery store from which she earns enough profit to care for her family and pay the school fees for her sister and brother. 

Faudhia is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders in order to build her own place where she can run her business. Until then, she must continue to rent an expensive room. She is also hoping to use her loan to expand her business. 

Through her lessons as a volunteer Camfed Learner Guide, Faudhia teaches students how to both find their own strengths and create a better world. 

The interest on Faudhia’s “social interest” loan will be repaid through her weekly 2 1/2 hours of volunteering which are so valuable for Camfed’s younger students.

loans.use: to build a store from where she can run her grocery business.

loans.name: Beatrice's Group

texts.en:
Beatrice, pictured above, has been a farmer for 20 years and is now proud to represent her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. She is 52 years old, married, and has 9 children.

Beatrice likes to think of herself as a very experienced farmer. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2014 and decided to represent her own group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to save more money. 

Beatrice will be receiving a solar light, and she is excited because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. She plans to use the profits from this coming season to buy a cow.

In total, Beatrice’s Group will receive seeds and fertilizer to cultivate 6 acres of land. In addition, they will receive a total of 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid maize seed and fertilizer as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Wilma Melina

texts.es:
Wilma Melina tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Pucará una comunidad de clima cálido, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de arroz, café y frutales, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica la venta de chicha de jora en el mercado de su distrito desde hace cinco años, por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de maíz amarillo y azúcar para la elaboración de chicha de jora y de esta manera ofrecer en mayor cantidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ventas y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilma Melina is 38 years old and lives with her husband and children in the Pucará district, a community with a warm climate. Its population works in agriculture, specifically the cultivation of rice, coffee and fruit, trading and animal husbandry. It is located in the Jaén province which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.

She has worked selling chicha de jora in the market in her district for five years and therefore has experience in this business and regular customers who provide good personal and professional references for her.

She has requested a loan to buy yellow corn and sugar for making chicha de jora and to in this way, offer a greater amount to her customers. This will have a positive impact on her sales and will thus improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy yellow corn and sugar for making chicha de jora (a traditional, corn based beer).

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 33-year-old cosmetics saleswoman, volunteer teacher, and mother. She chose to deal in cosmetics because most of the girls in her village like fashion and beauty. 

Mariam has always managed her business profitably, collecting money from her customers every day, which occupies a lot of her time. With the profit she generates, she keeps some for her own personal use with the rest used for helping local children in low living circumstances.

As a volunteer Camfed Learner Guide, Mariam also teaches life-skills to students in her local secondary school, including lessons on effective communication and personal confidence.

Mariam is now requesting a Kiva loan in order to rent an apartment from where she can work professionally and develop her cosmetics business. She also aims to enlarge her business as efficiently as possible. 

The interest on Mariam’s “social interest” loan will be repaid through her weekly 2 1/2 hours of volunteering, which are so valuable for Camfed’s younger students.

loans.use: to rent an apartment to locate her cosmetics business.

loans.name: Medalid

texts.es:
Medalid tiene 35 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como gallos, gallinas, pollos, patos, cuyes, etc; su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, con gran influencia en el negocio, ella espera incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores niveles de ventas y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Medalid, age 35, is married and has three children.  She lives with her family in the Oyotún district.  She lives in a rural area located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.  The inhabitants of this district work in agriculture, in commerce, and raise animals as their main business activities.

She raises and sells animals like roosters, hens, chickens, ducks, and guinea pigs, etc.  Her business is located at her house.  She has over ten years of experience in the business, and she has good references from the inhabitants of her district.

She is requesting the loan to buy more animals in order to increase the stock in her business.  This investment will help her to achieve greater variety and productivity with her animals, which will have a great impact on her business. 

She hopes to increase her stock of animals so that she can satisfy the different tastes and needs of her customers in the area.  This will generate a higher level of sales, and it will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more animals in order to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Amazing Grace Group

texts.en:
These women are part of the group called Amazing Grace, which is made up of six members. They are responsible parents with three children in total under their care. They are from Teshie, which is located in the Greater-Accra region. They are hardworking and responsible, with a desire for personal improvement. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources, they were unable to study toward a degree and they have had to work from a young age to help with the household expenses. Florence is the featured borrower of this group. She sells tea. She dedicates 12 hours (6 in the morning and 6 in the evening) per day to selling products in her business. She will use this loan to invest in working capital and buy tea bags, Milo, milk, bread, noodles, sugar, etc. to prepare tea and sell to customers, so that she can earn a better income in the near future. The "Amazing Grace" Group is grateful for the help which Kiva lenders provide for people with limited resources. They will hold each other responsible for repayment of the loan.

loans.use: to buy tea bags, Milo, milk, bread, noodles, sugar, etc. to prepare tea and sell to customers.

loans.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
O sr Arlindo tem 43 anos de idade, casado e pai de 03 filhos dos quais 02 frenquentam o ensino primário e secundário, respectivamente e o último é menor de idade, isto é, não estuda.
 Trabalha  como operador das panelas de fundição de alumínio. Está a construir a sua casa de sonhos e, com o empréstimo de 20.000,00mts, pretende comprar material de construção como: cimento, pó de pedras, carrada de area, estribos e varrões para reforçar o material que já tem em casa dando continuidade da conclusão da sua casa para acomodar a sua familia.
Para além de sonhar em concluir a sua casa, sonha também em aumentar o seu nível académico e profissional para poder melhorar as condições salariais, pois, o seu salário não chega para sustentar a familia durante o mês. Para superar essas dificuldades, tem recorrido ao trabalho de pedreiro aos finais de semana e nos dias de folga.
texts.en:
Arlindo is 43 years old and married. He has three children, two of whom attend primary and secondary school, respectively. The youngest son is underage, that is to say, he doesn't study.
He works as a ladle operator for an aluminium smelter. He's currently building his dream home and with the loan for 20,000mts he intends to purchase cement, stone dust, a shipload of sand, a stirrup and rods. That way he'll increase the amount of supplies he already has at home and continue to put the finishing touches on his house so that his family will be comfortable in it.
Aside from his dream of finishing his house, he also dreams of enhancing his education level and his career status. That way he'll improve his salary, which is not enough to support his family throughout the month. In order to overcome these struggles, he has turned to working as a bricklayer on weekends and on his days off from work.

loans.use: to purchase cement, stone dust, a shipload of sand, a stirrup and rods.

loans.name: Buaisha

texts.ru: Буайша, 38 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей. У Буайши среднее образование, 5 лет она занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Буайши, на сегодняшний день у нее имеется 0,15 ГА собственного земельного надела, где она ежегодно выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход от сельскохозяйственной деятельности составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Буайша обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для обработки почвы, часть средств она направит на покупку овец. Буайша намерена развить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она хочет вложить в обучение ее детей в университете.
texts.en: Buaisha is 38 years old, married, and she has two children.  She has a secondary education and she has been involved in crop farming and animal husbandry for five years.
